name: What is SEO
description: Section explaining SEO services with grid of service items

subtitle.default: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the practice of optimizing your website to rank higher in search results. Here's how we make it work for your business:

default.title: Keyword Research
default.description: In-depth analysis to identify high-value keywords that drive qualified traffic to your business.

default.title: On-Page Optimization
default.description: Optimize your website content, meta tags, and structure for maximum search engine visibility.

default.title: Technical SEO
default.description: Fix technical issues, improve site speed, and ensure your website is crawlable by search engines.

default.title: SEO Analytics
default.description: Track and measure your SEO performance with detailed reporting and actionable insights.

default.title: Link Building
default.description: Build high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites to boost your domain authority.

default.title: Local SEO
default.description: Optimize your business for local search results and Google My Business visibility.

default.title: Content Strategy
default.description: Create SEO-optimized content that engages your audience and ranks on search engines.

default.title: Competitor Analysis
default.description: Analyze your competitors' strategies to identify opportunities and stay ahead.

ctaText.default: Ready to see how SEO can transform your business?
